original_text:
Let everyone beware of his neighbor,
    and put no trust in any brother,
for every brother is a deceiver,
    and every neighbor goes about as a slanderer.
korean_text: 너희는 각기 이웃을 조심하며 어떤 형제든지 믿지 말라 형제마다 완전히 속이며 이웃마다 다니며 비방함이라

sentences.original_text: Let everyone beware of his neighbor
and put no trust in any brother
for every brother is a deceiver
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 모든 형제가 속이는 자이기 때문이라

sentences.original_text: and every neighbor goes about as a slanderer
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 모든 이웃은 비방하는 자로 행동한다
